docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge Friday struck down Arkansas' attempt to ban most abortions beginning 12 weeks into a woman's pregnancy, saying viability, not a heartbeat, remains the key factor in determining whether abortions should be allowed.

headline.main: US Judge Strikes Arkansas' 12-Week Abortion Ban
headline.print_headline: US Judge Strikes Arkansas' 12-Week Abortion Ban

docs.snippet: A federal judge Friday struck down Arkansas' attempt to ban most abortions beginning 12 weeks into a woman's pregnancy, saying viability, not a heartbeat, remains the key factor in determining whether abortions should be allowed.

docs.lead_paragraph: North Dakota's sole abortion clinic has settled a lawsuit it filed over a new law requiring doctors who perform abortions to obtain hospital-admitting privileges, officials said Friday.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: North Dakota Abortion Lawsuit Settled
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: North Dakota Abortion Lawsuit Settled

docs.snippet: North Dakota's sole abortion clinic has settled a lawsuit it filed over a new law requiring doctors who perform abortions to obtain hospital-admitting privileges, officials said Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Too many children are born to single mothers, but instead of addressing the issue from a policy perspective some harp on pop culture and blame Beyoncé.
docs.snippet: Too many children are born to single mothers, but instead of addressing the issue from a policy perspective some harp on pop culture and blame Beyoncé.

docs.abstract: Induced or cesarean section deliveries at 37 or 38 weeks, usually for convenience, was until recently widely considered benign. It isn’t.
docs.snippet: Induced or cesarean section deliveries at 37 or 38 weeks, usually for convenience, was until recently widely considered benign. It isn’t.

docs.lead_paragraph: - As the U.S. Supreme Court prepares to hear a religious dispute over the Obamacare contraception mandate, advocates on both sides are trying to set the court straight on the science.

headline.main: U.S. Top Court Case Highlights Unsettled Science in Contraception
headline.print_headline: U.S. Top Court Case Highlights Unsettled Science in Contraception

docs.snippet: - As the U.S. Supreme Court prepares to hear a religious dispute over the Obamacare contraception mandate, advocates on both sides are trying to set the court straight on the science.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin said he was concerned about the constitutionality of a bill banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, which the State Legislature passed over the weekend.

headline.main: West Virginia: Governor Weighs Abortion Bill
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Governor Weighs Abortion Bill

docs.snippet: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin said he was concerned about the constitutionality of a bill banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, which the State Legislature passed over the weekend.

docs.lead_paragraph: S angita Shrestha desperately waits in a hospital bed to see the baby girl she has just delivered. In the next room, a nurse applies a gel to the stump of the newborn's umbilical cord, wraps her in cloth and places her in a cot next to her mother.

headline.main: Nepal's Miracle Gel Saves Newborns From Infection
headline.print_headline: Nepal's Miracle Gel Saves Newborns From Infection

docs.abstract: Turns out access to free birth control doesn’t encourage promiscuity.
docs.snippet: Turns out access to free birth control doesn’t encourage promiscuity.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Kansas judge has overturned the state medical board's revocation of a doctor's license over her referrals of young patients for late-term abortions.

headline.main: Judge Sides With Kansas Doctor in Abortion Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Sides With Kansas Doctor in Abortion Case

docs.snippet: A Kansas judge has overturned the state medical board's revocation of a doctor's license over her referrals of young patients for late-term abortions.

headline.main: The Cleft-Lip Smile I Never Knew I'd Miss

docs.abstract: I love the face my son was born with, cleft lip and palate and all. I’m certain we did the right thing by correcting it, but I ache as I miss his triangular “before” smile.
docs.snippet: I love the face my son was born with, cleft lip and palate and all. I’m certain we did the right thing by correcting it, but I ache as I miss his triangular “before” smile.
